Class View

java.lang.Object
View
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComparePlants, ConditionScreen, Gallery, GardenDesign, Help, LearnMore, Lepedia, PlotDesign, Start, Summary
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class that holds all the views and any methods that are common among them

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    View​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Controller c, ManageViews manageView)
    View class that is the super class for all View screens
